test-case.name: V3 Login: To verify that user navigation on hitting application url
test-case.title: V3 Login: To verify that user navigation on hitting application url

test-case.name: Forget Password Link: To verify the functionality of Forgot Password? link on the CMS Login screen
test-case.title: Forget Password Link: To verify the functionality of Forgot Password? link on the CMS Login screen

test-case.name: Back to login link: To verify the navigation of the user on clicking back to Login link

test-case.name: Privacy Link: Verify the functionality of Privacy link on the CMS Login screen
test-case.title: Privacy Link: Verify the functionality of Privacy link on the CMS Login screen

test-case.name: Close browser windows and return to V3 Clone: To verify the case when user returns to login page and Release Notes & Privacy browser windows are closed
test-case.title: Close browser windows and return to V3 Clone: To verify the case when user returns to login page and Release Notes & Privacy browser windows are closed

test-case.name: Release Notes link: To verify the Release Note link on the CMS Login screen
test-case.title: Release Notes link: To verify the Release Note link on the CMS Login screen

test-case.name: Login with incorrect username: Enter the wrong Username and Password
test-case.title: Login with incorrect username: Enter the wrong Username and Password

test-case.name: Login with correct password: Enter the correct Username and Password for your admin account
test-case.title: Login with correct password: Enter the correct Username and Password for your admin account

test-case.name: To verify the page displayed after login to application: Observe the page loaded upon login
test-case.title: To verify the page displayed after login to application: Observe the page loaded upon login
